mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goods_no, goods_title, goods_price, goods_content , sales_area_number, sell_user_id, sell_user_nickname , goods_category, goods_status) VALUES (goods_seq.nextval, #{productName}, #{sellPrice} , #{productContent}, #{sellArea}, #{sellerId}, #{sellerNick} , #{sellCategory}, #{stateFlag})
mapper.select:
SELECT goods_no, sell_user_nickname, goods_title, goods_content, goods_category , goods_price, sales_area_number, goods_status, goods_created_date , sell_user_id FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(goods pk_goods)*/ ROWNUM rn, goods_no, sell_user_nickname, goods_title, goods_content, goods_category , goods_price, sales_area_number, goods_status, goods_created_date , sell_user_id FROM goods WHERE
goods_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
sell_user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
goods_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
(goods_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR goods_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND
ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods
WHERE goods_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE sell_user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE goods_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE (goods_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR goods_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
